definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, historically associated with individuals in various fields such as politics, media, and academia. Notably, it is the last name of Nick Clegg, a British politician who served as Deputy Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2010 to 2015.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英格兰的姓氏，历史上与政治、媒体和学术界等领域的个人相关。尤其著名的是英国政治家尼克·克雷格（Nick Clegg），他曾于2010年至2015年担任英国副首相。
definitions.example_en: Nick Clegg announced his resignation after the 2015 general election.
definitions.example_cn: 尼克·克雷格在2015年大选后宣布辞职。
